channel.title: Research on Noboru Murata
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Noboru Murata

item.title: Biological Data Analysis
item.description: Biological system can be regarded as a high-dimensional dynamical system with a complex structure. There are only a few variables that can be observed externally in a noisy and uncertain environment. In many cases, there is a large discrepancy between what we want to know and what we can measure. The key issue is how to model the generation mechanism of observable data in a concise manner with essential parts of the structure we want to know, and to devise a method to estimate unknown parameters efficiently and accurately.
